gololang

Class Runtime

  • java.lang.Object
    • gololang.Runtime

  • public final class Runtime
extends java.lang.Object
    A utility module containing functions to interact with the runtime environment.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • loadBoolean

        public static boolean loadBoolean(java.lang.String prop,
                                  java.lang.String env,
                                  boolean defaultValue)
        Get a boolean value from a system property or an environment variable.

        Equivalent to loadBoolean("true", prop, env, defaultValue)

        Parameters:
        prop - system property to get the value from, ignored if null.
        env - environment variable to get the value from, ignored if null.
        defaultValue - value to return if neither the property nor the environment are defined.

      • loadBoolean

        public static boolean loadBoolean(java.lang.String value,
                                  java.lang.String prop,
                                  java.lang.String env,
                                  boolean defaultValue)
        Get a boolean value from a system property or an environment variable.

        Checks if the property is defined and equals to the value (case insensitive), otherwise checks the environment variable, then use the default value.

        Parameters:
        value - content of the property.
        prop - system property to get the value from, ignored if null.
        env - environment variable to get the value from, ignored if null.
        defaultValue - value to return if neither the property nor the environment are defined.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if value is null and one of the property or environment is defined.

      • debugMode

        public static boolean debugMode()
        Checks if debug mode is active.

        The initial value is false, but can be redefined using the golo.debug system property, or the GOLO_DEBUG environment variable.

      • debugMode

        public static void debugMode(boolean v)
        Defines debug mode.

      • showStackTrace

        public static boolean showStackTrace()
        Checks if the main golo command should print stack traces on error.

      • showStackTrace

        public static void showStackTrace(boolean v)
        Defines if the main golo command should print stack traces on error.

      • command

        public static void command(CliCommand cmd)
        Defines the golo command currently used.

        This command is called at init time and should not be called in userland code.

      • command

        public static CliCommand command()
        Returns the golo command currently used.

      • classLoader

        public static GoloClassLoader classLoader()
        Returns the current thread class loader.

        Possibly wrapped in a GoloClassLoader if necessary.

      • load

        public static java.lang.Class<?> load(java.lang.Object module)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Load a golo file given its path or URL.

        Equivalent to load(module, true).

        Parameters:
        module - can be a String, a java.nio.file.Path, a java.net.URL or a java.net.URI identifying the file to load, or directly a GoloModule.
        Returns:
        the loaded module class.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        load(Object, boolean)

      • load

        public static java.lang.Class<?> load(java.lang.Object module,
                                      boolean failOnException)
                               throws java.lang.Exception
        Load a golo file given its path or URL.

        If failOnException is false, any exception is swallowed and null is return.

        Parameters:
        module - can be a String, a java.nio.file.Path, a java.net.URL or a java.net.URI identifying the file to load, or directly a GoloModule.
        failOnException - re-raise exception or not
        Returns:
        the loaded module class, or null if an error occurred and failOnException is false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        See Also:
        load(Object, boolean)

      • version

        public static java.lang.String version()
        Returns the current golo version.
